Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup

Class BackupTableInfo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.BackupTableInfo
@Private public class BackupTableInfo extends Object
Backup related information encapsulated for a table. At this moment only target directory, snapshot name and table name are encapsulated here.
